attributes.action: guarantee that no future monarch will be permitted to take an active role in politics or speak freely on political issues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prince Charles has reportedly expressed an interest in changing the role of the monarch once he becomes King, so he can involved himself in political decision making.  He wants a similar role to that of the Irish president, but without seeking election to public office.  Abolition of the monarchy is necessary, but in the meantime it is essential that we do not wind back the clock on hundreds of years of democratic constitutional reform.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
